data.eml:eml: Macrobothriotaenia ficta (Cestoda: Proteocephalidea), a parasite of sunbeam snake (Xenopeltis unicolor): example of convergent evolution

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Scholz, Tomáš, Chambrier, Alain De, Kuchta, Roman, Littlewood, D. Timothy J., Waeschenbach, Andrea (2013): Macrobothriotaenia ficta (Cestoda: Proteocephalidea), a parasite of sunbeam snake (Xenopeltis unicolor): example of convergent evolution. Zootaxa 3640 (3): 485-499, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3640.3.12
